rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports testing efforts without using high-potency verbs, metaphors, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment describes actions being taken (testing) but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
Segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes planned action as a surveillance effort ('department will test other flocks within a 10-kilometer (6-mile) zone').
